title: What's the difference!
creator_credit: Priscilla M. Clarke, Sally Abbott-Smith, Free Kindergarten Union Multicultural Resource Centre and Maude Media
brief_description: Examines the role of multicultural education in early childhood development programs. Explains that multicultural education is nesessary for all children and that it should be an overall agenda, incorporated into all aspects of early childhood development education.
